sourcesContent:
Username
Name is required.

Password
Password is required.

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { LocalService } from '../local.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { constructor (private localStore: LocalService, private route : ActivatedRoute, private router : Router) {} login : string = ''; password : string = ''; loginError : boolean = false; passwordError : boolean = false; logIn() : void { if (this.localStore.getData(this.login) == this.password) { // local store contains login and psw this.router.navigate(['/home', {UserLogin: this.login}]); } else if (this.localStore.getData(this.login) == null) { if (this.login == '' || this.password == '') { this.loginError = true ? this.login == '' : false; this.passwordError = true ? this.password == '' : false; } else { alert('No user with this login'); } } else { // password incorect alert('Incorect password'); } } }
